Package uk.ac.manchester.cs.spinnaker.rest

Interface NMPIQueue

@Path("/api/v2")
public interface NMPIQueue
The REST API for the HBP Neuromorphic Platform Interface queue.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.json.JacksonJsonProvider createProvider()
    Create a JSON provider capable of handling the messages on the NMPI queue.
    Job getJob​(int id)
    Get the queue status.
    QueueNextResponse getNextJob​(String hardware)
    Get the next queue item for a specific hardware system.
    APIKeyResponse getToken​(String username)
    Get the API token.
    void updateJob​(int id, Job job)
    Update the status of a queue item.
    void updateLog​(int id, NMPILog log)
    Update the log.

  • Method Details

    • getToken

      @GET @Path("token/auth") @Produces("application/json") APIKeyResponse getToken​(@QueryParam("username") String username)
      Get the API token.
      Parameters:
      username - The username.
      Returns:
      The token.

    • getNextJob

      @GET @Path("queue/submitted/next/{hardware}/") @Produces("application/json") QueueNextResponse getNextJob​(@PathParam("hardware") String hardware)
      Get the next queue item for a specific hardware system.
      Parameters:
      hardware - The hardware ID.
      Returns:
      The queue item.

    • updateJob

      @PUT @Path("queue/{id}") @Consumes("application/json") void updateJob​(@PathParam("id") int id, Job job)
      Update the status of a queue item.
      Parameters:
      id - The queue ID
      job - the Job document.

    • getJob

      @GET @Path("queue/{id}") @Produces("application/json") Job getJob​(@PathParam("id") int id)
      Get the queue status.
      Parameters:
      id - The queue ID
      Returns:
      The job on the queue.

    • updateLog

      @PUT @Path("log/{id}") @Consumes("application/json") void updateLog​(@PathParam("id") int id, NMPILog log)
      Update the log.
      Parameters:
      id - The queue ID
      log - The log entry

    • createProvider

      static com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.json.JacksonJsonProvider createProvider()
      Create a JSON provider capable of handling the messages on the NMPI queue.
      Returns:
      The provider.
